code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Paginate=_ref=>{let{currentPage,setCurrentPage,totalPosts,postPerPage}=_ref;const totalPages=Math.ceil(totalPosts/postPerPage);let pages=[];for(let p=1;p<=totalPages;p++){pages.push(p);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"pagination",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:`page-item ${currentPage===1&&`disabled`}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"page-link",onClick:()=>setCurrentPage(currentPage-1),children:"\xAB"})}),pages.map(page=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:`page-item ${page===currentPage&&`active`}`,onClick:()=>setCurrentPage(page),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"page-link",children:page})},page)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:`page-item ${currentPage===totalPages&&`disabled`}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"page-link",onClick:()=>setCurrentPage(currentPage+1),children:"\xBB"})})]});};export default Paginate;
